Docs.summary: Holds operations that apply to Azure rate card.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.RateCards.AzureRateCard Get (string currency = null, string region = null);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.RateCards.AzureRateCard Get(string currency, string region) cil managed
Public Function Get (Optional currency As String = null, Optional region As String = null) As AzureRateCard

Docs.param: An optional three letter ISO code for the currency in which the resource rates will be provided. The default is the currency associated with the market in the partner's profile.
An optional two-letter ISO country/region code that indicates the market where the offer is purchased. The default is the country/region code set in the partner profile.
Docs.summary: Gets the Azure rate card which provides real-time prices for Azure offers.
Docs.returns: The Azure rate card for the partner.

Docs.param: An optional three letter ISO code for the currency in which the resource rates will be provided. The default is the currency associated with the market in the partner's profile.
An optional two-letter ISO country/region code that indicates the market where the offer is purchased. The default is the country/region code set in the partner profile.
